Ahn-Crop Invader.flavor:
"Give me a crew like this one and I'd rule any sea I sailed."
—Angrath
Ahn-Crop Invader.name: Ahn-Crop Invader
Ahn-Crop Invader.text:
As long as it's your turn, Ahn-Crop Invader has first strike.
{1}, Sacrifice another creature: Ahn-Crop Invader gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

Aid the Fallen.flavor: "I never liked you. Now get up—we have a fight to finish."
Aid the Fallen.name: Aid the Fallen
Aid the Fallen.text:
Choose one or both—
• Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Return target planeswalker card from your graveyard to your hand.

Ajani's Pridemate.flavor: Planeswalkers conjured replicas of old allies, reminders of the homeworlds that would fall next if Bolas prevailed.
Ajani's Pridemate.name: Ajani's Pridemate
Ajani's Pridemate.text: Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Ajani's Pridemate.

Ajani, the Greathearted.name: Ajani, the Greathearted
Ajani, the Greathearted.text:
Creatures you control have vigilance.
+1: You gain 3 life.
-2: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control and a loyalty counter on each other planeswalker you control.

Angrath's Rampage.flavor: "Grand city? No. This is nothing but another squalid cage."
Angrath's Rampage.name: Angrath's Rampage
Angrath's Rampage.text:
Choose one —
• Target player sacrifices an artifact.
• Target player sacrifices a creature.
• Target player sacrifices a planeswalker.

Angrath, Captain of Chaos.name: Angrath, Captain of Chaos
Angrath, Captain of Chaos.text:
Creatures you control have menace.
-2: Amass 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

Arboreal Grazer.flavor:
"We fight to stop a tyrant, but we also fight for the gentle creatures who have no concept of what befalls their world."
—Vivien Reid
Arboreal Grazer.name: Arboreal Grazer
Arboreal Grazer.text:
Reach
When Arboreal Grazer enters the battlefield, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.

Arlinn's Wolf.flavor:
"If you don't speak wolf, allow me to translate: 'One step closer and I'll rip out your throat.'"
—Arlinn Kord
Arlinn's Wolf.name: Arlinn's Wolf
Arlinn's Wolf.text: Arlinn's Wolf can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.

Arlinn, Voice of the Pack.name: Arlinn, Voice of the Pack
Arlinn, Voice of the Pack.text:
Each creature you control that's a Wolf or Werewolf enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
-2: Create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.

Ashiok's Skulker.flavor:
"Fear writhes and whispers in the shadows of your mind. It is the enemy you always knew would come."
—Ashiok
Ashiok's Skulker.name: Ashiok's Skulker
Ashiok's Skulker.text: {3}{U}: Ashiok's Skulker can't be blocked this turn.

Ashiok, Dream Render.name: Ashiok, Dream Render
Ashiok, Dream Render.text:
Spells and abilities your opponents control can't cause their controller to search their library.
-1: Target player puts the top four cards of their library into their graveyard. Then exile each opponent's graveyard.

Augur of Bolas.flavor: "There is no future save the one my master wills."
Augur of Bolas.name: Augur of Bolas
Augur of Bolas.text: When Augur of Bolas enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal an instant or sorcery card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

Aven Eternal.flavor:
"I've never seen the firemane angels so anxious."
—Tajic
Aven Eternal.name: Aven Eternal
Aven Eternal.text:
Flying
When Aven Eternal enters the battlefield, amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

Awakening of Vitu-Ghazi.flavor: The Eternal armies advanced on Vitu-Ghazi. At Nissa's command, Vitu-Ghazi advanced on them.
Awakening of Vitu-Ghazi.name: Awakening of Vitu-Ghazi
Awakening of Vitu-Ghazi.text: Put nine +1/+1 counters on target land you control. It becomes a legendary 0/0 Elemental creature with haste named Vitu-Ghazi. It's still a land.

Band Together.flavor: In times of peril, the vision the ancient paruns had for their city comes into focus.
Band Together.name: Band Together
Band Together.text: Up to two target creatures you control each deal damage equal to their power to another target creature.

Banehound.flavor:
"I wish I could train a pack of them for hunting in the undercity. But I'd never dare turn my back, and I hate to think what I'd have to feed them."
—Zhosmir, urban huntmaster
Banehound.name: Banehound

Battlefield Promotion.flavor: "Welcome to the Legion. You saved a district—now let's go save the world."
Battlefield Promotion.name: Battlefield Promotion
Battlefield Promotion.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. That creature gains first strike until end of turn. You gain 2 life.

Bioessence Hydra.name: Bioessence Hydra
Bioessence Hydra.text:
Trample
Bioessence Hydra enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each loyalty counter on planeswalkers you control.
Whenever one or more loyalty counters are put on planeswalkers you control, put that many +1/+1 counters on Bioessence Hydra.

Blast Zone.name: Blast Zone
Blast Zone.text:
Blast Zone enters the battlefield with a charge counter on it.
{T}: Add {C}.
{X}{X}, {T}: Put X charge counters on Blast Zone.
{3}, {T}, Sacrifice Blast Zone: Destroy each nonland permanent with converted mana cost equal to the number of charge counters on Blast Zone.

Bleeding Edge.name: Bleeding Edge
Bleeding Edge.text: Up to one target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. Amass 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

Blindblast.flavor:
"Peril is in the eye of the beholder. At least, if your aim is good."
—Jaya Ballard
Blindblast.name: Blindblast
Blindblast.text:
Blindblast deals 1 damage to target creature. That creature can't block this turn.
Draw a card.

Bloom Hulk.flavor:
"Tread upon these flower beds at your own peril."
—Emmara
Bloom Hulk.name: Bloom Hulk
Bloom Hulk.text: When Bloom Hulk enters the battlefield, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

Bolas's Citadel.name: Bolas's Citadel
Bolas's Citadel.text:
You may look at the top card of your library any time.
You may play the top card of your library. If you cast a spell this way, pay life equal to its converted mana cost rather than pay its mana cost.
{T}, Sacrifice ten nonland permanents: Each opponent loses 10 life.

Bolt Bend.flavor:
"Give them everything you've got . . . and some things you don't.
—Ral Zarek
Bolt Bend.name: Bolt Bend
Bolt Bend.text:
This spell costs {3} less to cast if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.
Change the target of target spell or ability with a single target.

Bond of Discipline.flavor: "We agree that order benefits everyone, but not until you enforce it."
Bond of Discipline.name: Bond of Discipline
Bond of Discipline.text: Tap all creatures your opponents control. Creatures you control gain lifelink until end of turn.

Bond of Flourishing.flavor: "We agree that life should flourish. We disagree on the optimal number of limbs."
Bond of Flourishing.name: Bond of Flourishing
Bond of Flourishing.text: Look at the top three card of your library. You may reveal a permanent card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. You gain 3 life.

Bond of Insight.flavor: "Together we can unlock secrets no one has even dreamed of. I might even let you remember some of them."
Bond of Insight.name: Bond of Insight
Bond of Insight.text: Each player puts the top four cards of their library into their graveyard. Return up to two instant and/or sorcery cards from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Bond of Insight.

Bond of Passion.flavor: "Why don't we fight for what's right and let bureaucrats argue over the details?"
Bond of Passion.name: Bond of Passion
Bond of Passion.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Bond of Passion deals 2 damage to any other target.

Bond of Revival.flavor: "Today we throw off the yoke of death. Either this is an affirmation of the eternal cyclical nature of life, or it's just hilarious—depends on which of us you ask."
Bond of Revival.name: Bond of Revival
Bond of Revival.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste until your next turn.

Bulwark Giant.flavor:
"Where did she come from? More importantly, are there more like her?"
—Gideon Jura
Bulwark Giant.name: Bulwark Giant
Bulwark Giant.text: When Bulwark Giant enters the battlefield, you gain 5 life.

Burning Prophet.flavor: "This day will end in death, but not the one you hoped for. This day will end in victory, but not the one you expected."
Burning Prophet.name: Burning Prophet
Burning Prophet.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Burning Prophet gets +1/+0 until end of turn, then scry 1.

Callous Dismissal.flavor:
"They make it clear we are nothing to them."
—Lavinia
Callous Dismissal.name: Callous Dismissal
Callous Dismissal.text:
Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
Amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie army creature token first.)

Casualties of War.name: Casualties of War
Casualties of War.text:
Choose one or more —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target creature.
• Destroy target enchantment.
• Destroy target land.
• Destroy target planeswalker.

Centaur Nurturer.flavor: "I call upon the vigor of the grasses, the hopes of the flowers, and the dreams of the trees."
Centaur Nurturer.name: Centaur Nurturer
Centaur Nurturer.text:
When Centaur Nurturer enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

Chainwhip Cyclops.flavor:
"You say this Tenth District, not Rubblebelt. But where smash happen, that Rubblebelt. Rubblebelt state of mind."
—Urgdar, cyclops philosopher
Chainwhip Cyclops.name: Chainwhip Cyclops
Chainwhip Cyclops.text: {3}{R}: Target creature can't block this turn.

Challenger Troll.flavor: For most, war is a calamity. For some, an opportunity. And for the very few, a pleasure.
Challenger Troll.name: Challenger Troll
Challenger Troll.text: Each creature you control with power 4 or greater can't be blocked by more than one creature.

Chandra's Pyrohelix.flavor:
"Now that I've dealt with your little toys, I can focus on the real problem: you."
—Chandra Nalaar, to Dovin Baan
Chandra's Pyrohelix.name: Chandra's Pyrohelix
Chandra's Pyrohelix.text: Chandra's Pyrohelix deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets.

Chandra's Triumph.flavor: Her triumph came from not achieving her ideal self, but from rejecting the idea of perfection.
Chandra's Triumph.name: Chandra's Triumph
Chandra's Triumph.text: Chandra's Triumph deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls. Chandra's Triumph deals 5 damage to that permanent instead if you control a Chandra planeswalker.

Chandra, Fire Artisan.name: Chandra, Fire Artisan
Chandra, Fire Artisan.text:
Whenever one or more loyalty counters are removed from Chandra, Fire Artisan, she deals that much damage to target opponent or planeswalker.
+1: Exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn.
-7: Exile the top seven cards of your library. You may play them this turn.

Charity Extractor.flavor: "War or no war, your donations are due, as always."
Charity Extractor.name: Charity Extractor

Charmed Stray.flavor:
"There's something peculiar about the cats today."
—Janoc, Tin Street tinker
Charmed Stray.name: Charmed Stray
Charmed Stray.text:
Lifelink
Whenever Charmed Stray enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control named Charmed Stray.

Command the Dreadhorde.flavor: Liliana seized the reins of Bolas's vast army, gritting her teeth behind the Chain Veil.

Command the Dreadhorde.text: Choose any number of target creature and/or planeswalker cards in graveyards. Command the Dreadhorde deals damage to you equal to the total converted mana cost of those cards. Put them onto the battlefield under your control.

Commence the Endgame.name: Commence the Endgame
Commence the Endgame.text:
This spell can't be countered.
Draw two cards, then amass X, where X is the number of cards in your hand. (Put X +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

Contentious Plan.flavor: Niv Mizzet had perfected a plan, but he had no control over the mortal minds who had to agree to implement it.
Contentious Plan.name: Contentious Plan
Contentious Plan.text:
Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
Draw a card.

Courage in Crisis.flavor: "Thanks to my father, I know how to fight. He also showed me why I must."
Courage in Crisis.name: Courage in Crisis
Courage in Crisis.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature, then proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

Cruel Celebrant.flavor: "Whichever side wins, I'm sure the banquet will be superb."
Cruel Celebrant.name: Cruel Celebrant
Cruel Celebrant.text: Whenever Cruel Celebrant or another creature or planeswalker you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

Crush Dissent.flavor:
"All I ask is complete obedience."
—Nicol Bolas
Crush Dissent.name: Crush Dissent
Crush Dissent.text:
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}.
Amass 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

Cyclops Electromancer.name: Cyclops Electromancer
Cyclops Electromancer.text: When Cyclops Electromancer enters the battlefield, it deals X damage to target creature an opponent controls, where X is the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard.

Davriel's Shadowfugue.flavor: Shadows coiled around the witness's mind. Then the moment vanished, leaving only the sting of its loss.
Davriel's Shadowfugue.name: Davriel's Shadowfugue
Davriel's Shadowfugue.text: Target player discards two cards and loses 2 life.

Davriel, Rogue Shadowmage.name: Davriel, Rogue Shadowmage
Davriel, Rogue Shadowmage.text:
At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player has one or fewer cards in hand, Davriel, Rogue Shadowmage deals 2 damage to them.
-1: Target player discards a card.

Deathsprout.flavor:
"They say nothing lasts forever. I say everything lasts forever, just not in the form you may be accustomed to."
—Vraska
Deathsprout.name: Deathsprout
Deathsprout.text: Destroy target creature. Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

Defiant Strike.flavor: "My family was saved thanks to a single Boros soldier. It's why I joined the Legion. I will be the protector now."
Defiant Strike.name: Defiant Strike
Defiant Strike.text:
Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Draw a card.

Deliver Unto Evil.name: Deliver Unto Evil
Deliver Unto Evil.text:
Choose up to four target cards in your graveyard. If you control a Bolas planeswalker, return those cards to your hand. Otherwise, an opponent chooses two of them. Leave the chosen cards in your graveyard and put the rest into your hand.
Exile Deliver Unto Evil.

Demolish.flavor:
"For every inch of land they take from us, we take it back or we burn it. Give them nothing."
—Aurelia
Demolish.name: Demolish

Despark.flavor: Liliana whispered to whatever consciousness Oketra and Bontu had left. "You are the gods. He is the usurper. You know what to do"
Despark.name: Despark
Despark.text: Exile target permanent with converted mana cost 4 or greater.

Desperate Lunge.flavor: Ravnica held its breath as the hero of the resistance—their last hope—flew through the sky, his dark sword ready to strike a god.
Desperate Lunge.name: Desperate Lunge
Desperate Lunge.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn. You gain 2 life.

Devouring Hellion.flavor: There's no crisis a hellion can't make worse.
Devouring Hellion.name: Devouring Hellion
Devouring Hellion.text: As Devouring Hellion enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures and/or planeswalkers. If you do, it enters with twice that many +1/+1 counters on it.

Divine Arrow.flavor: Ravnica's defenders watched in horror as Oketra's shot pierced the body of the pegasus. Gideon tumbled through the air, Blackblade in hand.
Divine Arrow.name: Divine Arrow
Divine Arrow.text: Divine Arrow deals 4 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

Domri's Ambush.flavor: "When civilization teeters on the brink, I'll be there to kick it the rest of the way."
Domri's Ambush.name: Domri's Ambush
Domri's Ambush.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then that creature deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker you don't control.

Domri, Anarch of Bolas.name: Domri, Anarch of Bolas
Domri, Anarch of Bolas.text:
Creatures you control get +1/+0.
+1: Add {R} or {G}. Creature spells you cast this turn can't be countered.
-2: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control.

Dovin's Veto.flavor: "I see you've learned nothing, Chandra. You'd still put a match to something rather than understand it."
Dovin's Veto.name: Dovin's Veto
Dovin's Veto.text:
This spell can't be countered.
Counter target noncreature spell.

Dovin, Hand of Control.name: Dovin, Hand of Control
Dovin, Hand of Control.text:
Artifact, instant, and sorcery spells your opponents cast cost {1} more to cast.
-1: Until your next turn, prevent all damage that would be dealt to and dealt by target permanent an opponent controls.

Dreadhorde Arcanist.name: Dreadhorde Arcanist
Dreadhorde Arcanist.text:
Trample
Whenever Dreadhorde Arcanist attacks, you may cast target instant or sorcery card with converted mana cost less than or equal to Dreadhorde Arcanist's power from your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that card would be put into your graveyard this turn, exile it instead.

Dreadhorde Butcher.name: Dreadhorde Butcher
Dreadhorde Butcher.text:
Haste
Whenever Dreadhorde Butcher deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, put a +1/+1 counter on Dreadhorde Butcher.
When Dreadhorde Butcher dies, it deals damage equal to its power to any target.

Dreadhorde Invasion.name: Dreadhorde Invasion
Dreadhorde Invasion.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life and amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
Whenever a Zombie token you control with power 6 or greater attacks, it gains lifelink until end of turn.

Dreadhorde Twins.name: Dreadhorde Twins
Dreadhorde Twins.text:
When Dreadhorde Twins enters the battlefield, amass 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
Zombie tokens you control have trample.

Dreadmalkin.flavor: The feline Eternal felt Liliana's command, looked at her disdainfully, flicked its paw, and scampered away across the rooftops.
Dreadmalkin.name: Dreadmalkin
Dreadmalkin.text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
{2}{B}, Sacrifice another creature or planeswalker: Put two +1/+1 counters on Dreadmalkin.

Duskmantle Operative.flavor: Gideon eyed the Dimir emissary warily. "Could your agents slip inside Bolas's citadel?" The figure met his gaze with icy resolve. "We already have."
Duskmantle Operative.name: Duskmantle Operative
Duskmantle Operative.text: Duskmantle Operative can't be blocked by creatures with power 4 or greater.

Elite Guardmage.flavor:
"Be careful. You'll have more than Dovin to contend with if you hope to breach New Prahv"
—Lavinia, to Chandra Nalaar
Elite Guardmage.name: Elite Guardmage
Elite Guardmage.text:
Flying
When Elite Guardmage enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life and draw a card.

Emergence Zone.flavor: The Planar Bridge opened over the Chamber of the Guildpact, reducing the symbol of Ravnica's endurance to rubble.
Emergence Zone.name: Emergence Zone
Emergence Zone.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Emergence Zone: You may cast spells this turn as though they had flash.

Enforcer Griffin.flavor:
"A company of infantry is trapped behind the lines. We need to strike hard and fast to free them, or the casualties will be horrific. Send the griffins."
—Tajic
Enforcer Griffin.name: Enforcer Griffin

Enter the God-Eternals.name: Enter the God-Eternals
Enter the God-Eternals.text: Enter the God-Eternals deals 4 damage to target creature and you gain life equal to the damage dealt this way. Target player puts the top four cards of their library into their graveyard. Amass 4. (Put four +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

Erratic Visionary.flavor: An Izzet experiment begins with a "what if," gets approved with a "why not," and concludes with a "eureka!"
Erratic Visionary.name: Erratic Visionary
Erratic Visionary.text: {1}{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

Eternal Skylord.name: Eternal Skylord
Eternal Skylord.text:
When Eternal Skylord enters the battlefield, amass 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
Zombie tokens you control have flying.

Eternal Taskmaster.flavor:
"They are called Eternals. They will never stop."
—Jace Beleren
Eternal Taskmaster.name: Eternal Taskmaster
Eternal Taskmaster.text:
Eternal Taskmaster enters the battlefield tapped.
Whenever Eternal Taskmaster attacks, you may pay {2}{B}. If you do, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

Evolution Sage.flavor: "To care for yourself, cultivate the world. To care for the world, cultivate yourself."
Evolution Sage.name: Evolution Sage
Evolution Sage.text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

Fblthp, the Lost.name: Fblthp, the Lost
Fblthp, the Lost.text:
When Fblthp, the Lost enters the battlefield, draw a card. If it entered from your library or was cast from your library, draw two cards instead.
When Fblthp becomes the target of a spell, shuffle Fblthp into its owner's library.

Feather, the Redeemed.name: Feather, the Redeemed
Feather, the Redeemed.text:
Flying
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell that targets a creature you control, exile that card instead of putting it into your graveyard as it resolves. If you do, return it to your hand at the beginning of the next end step.

Finale of Devastation.flavor: Some spells sing a quiet tune. Others roar.
Finale of Devastation.name: Finale of Devastation
Finale of Devastation.text: Search your library and/or graveyard for a creature card with converted mana cost X or less and put it onto the battlefield. If you search your library this way, shuffle it. If X is 10 or more, creatures you control get +X/+X and gain haste until end of turn.

Finale of Eternity.flavor: When you rule by fear, your greatest weakness is one who's no longer afraid.
Finale of Eternity.name: Finale of Eternity
Finale of Eternity.text: Destroy up to three target creatures with toughness X or less. If X is 10 or more, return all creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.

Finale of Glory.flavor: The sky boiled over the citadel, dire and dark. then the angels brought the dawn.
Finale of Glory.name: Finale of Glory
Finale of Glory.text: Create X 2/2 white Soldier creature tokens with vigilance. If X is 10 or more, also create X 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying and vigilance.

Finale of Promise.name: Finale of Promise
Finale of Promise.text: You may cast up to one target instant card and/or sorcery card from your graveyard each with converted mana cost X or less without paying their mana costs. If a card cast this way would be put into your graveyard this turn, exile it instead. If X is 10 or more, copy each of those spells twice. You may choose new targets for the copies.

Finale of Revelation.flavor: Ugin saw the gem that connected Bolas to his Meditation Realm as the key to his brother's downfall.
Finale of Revelation.name: Finale of Revelation
Finale of Revelation.text:
Draw X cards. If X is 10 or more, instead shuffle your graveyard into your library, draw X cards, untap up to five lands, and you have no maximum hand size for the rest of the game.
Exile Finale of Revelation.

Firemind Vessel.flavor: The city mourned for Niv-Mizzet's death, but he left behind the components for his rebirth.
Firemind Vessel.name: Firemind Vessel
Firemind Vessel.text:
Firemind Vessel enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add two mana of different colors.

Flux Channeler.flavor: "Inform our allies in the Tenth and throw the circuit. It's about to get weird."
Flux Channeler.name: Flux Channeler
Flux Channeler.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

Forced Landing.flavor: The druid knew only one spell, a charm to encourage rapid plant growth. When airborne Eternals invaded her arboretum, she had to get creative.
Forced Landing.name: Forced Landing
Forced Landing.text: Put target creature with flying on the bottom of its owner's library.

Gateway Plaza.flavor: Guild leaders focused their magic on the portal scar. Where the Chamber perished, a parun could be reborn.
Gateway Plaza.name: Gateway Plaza
Gateway Plaza.text:
Gateway Plaza enters the battlefield tapped.
When Gateway Plaza enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you pay {1}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

Giant Growth.flavor:
"Sometimes Mowu is content to gnaw on a bone. Sometimes he wants the whole skeleton."
—Jiang Yanggu
Giant Growth.name: Giant Growth
Giant Growth.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

Gideon Blackblade.name: Gideon Blackblade
Gideon Blackblade.text:
As long as it's your turn, Gideon Blackblade is a 4/4 Human Soldier creature with indestructible that's still a planeswalker.
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Gideon Blackblade during your turn.
+1: Up to one other target creature you control gains your choice of vigilance, lifelink, or indestructible until end of turn.
-6: Exile target nonland permanent.

Gideon's Battle Cry.flavor: "Break their formation! Thin their ranks! I'm right behind you!"
Gideon's Battle Cry.name: Gideon's Battle Cry
Gideon's Battle Cry.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. You may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Gideon, the Oathsworn, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.

Gideon's Company.name: Gideon's Company
Gideon's Company.text:
Whenever you gain life, put two +1/+1 counters on Gideon's Company.
{3}{W}: Put a loyalty counter on target Gideon planeswalker.

Gideon's Sacrifice.flavor: To Liliana's surprise, the cost of betraying Bolas did not fall on her.
Gideon's Sacrifice.name: Gideon's Sacrifice
Gideon's Sacrifice.text: Choose a creature or planeswalker you control. All damage that would be dealt this turn to you and permanents you control is dealt to the chosen permanent instead (if it's still on the battlefield).

Gideon's Triumph.flavor: His triumph came not from victory over his enemies, but from the salvation of those who survived.
Gideon's Triumph.name: Gideon's Triumph
Gideon's Triumph.text: Target opponent sacrifices a creature that attacked or blocked this turn. If you control a Gideon planeswalker, that player sacrifices two of those creatures instead.

Gideon, the Oathsworn.name: Gideon, the Oathsworn

Whenever you attack with two or more non-Gideon creatures, put a +1/+1 counter on each of those creatures.

-9: Exile Gideon, the Oathsworn and each creature your opponents control.

Gleaming Overseer.name: Gleaming Overseer

When Gleaming Overseer enters the battlefield, amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
Zombie tokens you control have hexproof and menace.

Goblin Assailant.flavor: What he lacks in patience, intelligence, empathy, lucidity, hygiene, ability to follow orders, self-regard, and discernible skills, he makes up for in sheer chaotic violence.

Goblin Assault Team.flavor: Under the veneer of the various guilds, each goblin has the same basic need: to run screaming at the enemy and hit a bunch of stuff.

Goblin Assault Team.text:
Haste

God-Eternal Kefnet.text:
Flying

When God-Eternal Kefnet dies or is put into exile from the battlefield, you may put it into its owner's library third from the top.

When God-Eternal Oketra dies or is put into exile from the battlefield, you may put it into its owner's library third from the top.

When God-Eternal Rhonas dies or is put into exile from the battlefield, you may put it into its owner's library third from the top.

God-Pharaoh's Statue.flavor: A dictator's infuriating smirk, an affront to everything Ravnica stood for.

God-Pharaoh's Statue.text:

Grateful Apparition.name: Grateful Apparition
Grateful Apparition.text:
Flying

Grim Initiate.flavor: Beneath each gleaming mineral shell rots a once-proud warrior of Amonkhet.

Guild Globe.flavor:
"Hopefully Ravnica will prove harder to break."

Flying

Herald of the Dreadhorde.flavor: Amonkhet's dead flowed into a new world in service to their God-Pharaoh.

Honor the God-Pharaoh.flavor: In life, they revered a diverse pantheon of gods. Now they revere only the God-Pharaoh.

Honor the God-Pharaoh.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards. Amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

Huatli's Raptor.flavor: The essence of Ixalan was never far from Huatli's heart.
Huatli's Raptor.name: Huatli's Raptor

Vigilance

Ignite the Beacon.flavor:

Ilharg, the Raze-Boar.text:
Trample

When Ilharg, the Raze-Boar dies or is put into exile from the battlefield, you may put it into its owner's library third from the top.

Interplanar Beacon.name: Interplanar Beacon
Interplanar Beacon.text:
Whenever you cast a planeswalker spell, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}: Add two mana of different colors. Spend this mana only to cast planeswalker spells.

Invade the City.flavor: Death greeted the world with a roar of desert air.
Invade the City.name: Invade the City
Invade the City.text: Amass X, where X is the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard. (Put X +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

Invading Manticore.flavor:
"Fall back! You are no match for this."
—Samut
Invading Manticore.name: Invading Manticore

Iron Bully.flavor:
"Why would someone have built ... wait, never mind. Send it to the front lines!"
—Commander Grozdan
Iron Bully.name: Iron Bully
Iron Bully.text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
When Iron Bully enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

Ironclad Krovod.flavor:
"We need to block the exits from the plaza! What's big, heavy, and available?"
—Gideon Jura
Ironclad Krovod.name: Ironclad Krovod

Jace's Projection.flavor: "Pardon me if I seem distracted. Part of me is reconnoitering the Tenth District."

{3}{U}: Put a loyalty counter on target Jace planeswalker.

Jace's Ruse.flavor: "The Eternals can recognize faces. They just think I look like a blue minotaur."

Jace's Triumph.flavor: His triumph was not in outsmarting Bolas's plan, but in understanding why ultimate power is self-defeating.
Jace's Triumph.name: Jace's Triumph
Jace's Triumph.text: Draw two cards. If you control a Jace planeswalker, draw three cards instead.

Jace, Arcane Strategist.name: Jace, Arcane Strategist

Whenever you draw your second card each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

-7: Creatures you control can't be blocked this turn.

If you would draw a card while your library has no cards in it, you win the game instead.

-8: Draw seven cards. Then if your library has no cards in it, you win the game.

Jaya's Greeting.flavor: "We have visitors? Well, it'd be rude not to give them a traditional Keral Keep welcome."
Jaya's Greeting.name: Jaya's Greeting

Jaya, Venerated Firemage.name: Jaya, Venerated Firemage

Jiang Yanggu, Wildcrafter.name: Jiang Yanggu, Wildcrafter

-1: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

Karn's Bastion.flavor:
"I can't protect everyone here. But those I can, I will."

Karn's Bastion.name: Karn's Bastion
Karn's Bastion.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{4}, {T}: Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

-2: You may choose an artifact card you own from outside the game or in exile, reveal that card, and put it into your hand.

Kasmina's Transmutation.flavor:

Kaya's Ghostform.flavor: The Eternals found some sparks to be quite slippery.

Kaya's Ghostform.text:
Enchant creature or planeswalker you control

Kiora's Dambreaker.flavor:

Kiora's Dambreaker.name: Kiora's Dambreaker

Kronch Wrangler.flavor: Looking over two city blocks of destruction, he could only cackle with pride.

Trample

Law-Rune Enforcer.flavor:

Law-Rune Enforcer.text: {1}, {T}: Tap target creature with converted mana cost 2 or greater.

Lazotep Behemoth.flavor:

Lazotep Behemoth.name: Lazotep Behemoth

Lazotep Plating.name: Lazotep Plating
Lazotep Plating.text:

You and permanents you control gain hexproof until end of turn. (You and they can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

Lazotep Reaver.flavor: Despite their many forms, the Eternals worked in chilling harmony, unburdened by instinct or emotion.

Leyline Prowler.flavor: It feeds on the dark energies that course through the deep world—and on any other creature lured by the leyline's pull.

Deathtouch, lifelink

Living Twister.flavor:

Loxodon Sergeant.flavor: His voice is both war horn and rallying cry, a trumpeting call that stirs even the faintest heart.

Mana Geode.flavor:

Mowu, Loyal Companion.flavor: Wherever Yanggu goes, Mowu follows—sometimes at his side, sometimes obscuring him from view entirely.

Naga Eternal.flavor:
"I recognize that headdress. This one was feared even by her fellow initiates."

Naga Eternal.name: Naga Eternal

Nahiri's Stoneblades.flavor: The ancient Planeswalkers Sorin and Nahiri battled across Ravnica, their blows cutting as deep as their grudge.

Nahiri's Stoneblades.text: Up to two target creatures each get +2/+0 until end of turn.

Nahiri, Storm of Stone.text:
As long as it's your turn, creatures you control have first strike and equip abilities you activate cost {1} less to activate.
-X: Nahiri, Storm of Stone deals X damage to target tapped creature.

Narset's Reversal.flavor:
"In the disarray of battle, an enemy's attack may be your most convenient weapon."

New Horizons.text:
Enchant land

Nicol Bolas, Dragon-God.text:
Nicol Bolas, Dragon-God has all loyalty abilities of all other planeswalkers on the battlefield.
+1: You draw a card. Each opponent exiles a card from their hand or a permanent they control.
-3: Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
-8: Each opponent who doesn't control a legendary creature or planeswalker loses the game.

Nissa's Triumph.flavor: Her triumph came not from destroying the unnatural, but from fostering life.

Whenever you tap a Forest for mana, add an additional {G}.

-8: You get an emblem with "Lands you control have indestructible." Search your library for any number of Forest cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

Niv-Mizzet Reborn.name: Niv-Mizzet Reborn
Niv-Mizzet Reborn.text:
Flying

No Escape.flavor: Jace surmised that they were walking into Bolas's trap. He felt no joy in being right.

No Escape.text:
Counter target creature or planeswalker spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.
Scry 1.

Oath of Kaya.flavor: "So everyone gets what they truly deserve, I will keep watch."

Oath of Kaya.text:
When Oath of Kaya enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.
Whenever an opponent attacks a planeswalker you control with one or more creatures, Oath of Kaya deals 2 damage to that player and you gain 2 life.

Ob Nixilis's Cruelty.flavor: Trapped on Ravnica with no affection for either side, Ob Nixilis sought gratification in random acts of torment.

Whenever an opponent draws a card, Ob Nixilis, the Hate-Twisted deals 1 damage to that player.

Orzhov Guildgate.flavor:
"So much wealth. So much splendor. So much temptation to believe the gilded lie."

Paradise Druid.flavor: "There are many kinds of duty, and mine is to see our world grow and endure."

{T}: Add one mana of any color.

Parhelion II.name: Parhelion II

Whenever Parhelion II attacks, create two 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying and vigilance that are attacking.

Pledge of Unity.flavor:
"No one hero will save this day. Today we must all be heroes."

Pollenbright Druid.name: Pollenbright Druid

When Pollenbright Druid enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
• Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

Pouncing Lynx.flavor: "I don't understand. He's normally so well behaved!"

Pouncing Lynx.text: As long as it's your turn, Pouncing Lynx has first strike.

Price of Betrayal.flavor: The moment Liliana defied Nicol Bolas, her contract was broken, and her life was forfeit. But she was free to choose her fate, and she decided it was worth the price.
Price of Betrayal.name: Price of Betrayal
Price of Betrayal.text: Remove up to five counters from target artifact, creature, planeswalker, or opponent.

Primordial Wurm.flavor: Elite training, singled-minded devotion, and lazotep coating help only so much for invaders who are fundamentally bite-sized.
Primordial Wurm.name: Primordial Wurm

Prismite.flavor: It didn't budge when the portal opened, nor when the ancient gods emerged. I came to life only when all ten guilds came together to face a common threat.
Prismite.name: Prismite
Prismite.text: {2}: Add one mana of any color.

Prison Realm.flavor: After millenia to craft victory, Bolas had eternity to contemplate defeat.
Prison Realm.name: Prison Realm
Prison Realm.text:
When Prison Realm enters the battlefield, exile target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls until Prison Realm leaves the battlefield.
When Prison Realm enters the battlefield, scry 1.

Raging Kronch.flavor:
"Seeing so much easy prey makes her crazy. See how she snorts and drools?"
—Dhuuz, kronch wrangler
Raging Kronch.name: Raging Kronch

Ral's Outburst.flavor:
"Time to find the melting point of lazotep."
—Ral Zarek
Ral's Outburst.name: Ral's Outburst
Ral's Outburst.text: Ral's Outburst deals 3 damage to any target. Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

Ral, Storm Conduit.name: Ral, Storm Conduit
Ral, Storm Conduit.text:
Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, Ral, Storm Conduit deals 1 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.
+2: Scry 1.
-2: When you cast your next instant or sorcery spell this turn, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

Rally of Wings.flavor: Even the clouds became a field of battle. Known as the Sky Theater, it saw the Eternals clash with squadrons of angels.
Rally of Wings.name: Rally of Wings
Rally of Wings.text: Untap all creatures you control. Creatures you control with flying get +2/+2 until end of turn.

Ravnica at War.flavor: The heart of Ravnica disappeared before anyone could strike a blow in its defense.
Ravnica at War.name: Ravnica at War

Relentless Advance.flavor: They approach in formation, every movement efficient and sure. They halt, listen, and then press on in silent unison.
Relentless Advance.name: Relentless Advance
Relentless Advance.text: Amass 3. (Put three +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

Rescuer Sphinx.flavor: "Now, little fighter, show me you deserved this second chance."
Rescuer Sphinx.name: Rescuer Sphinx
Rescuer Sphinx.text:
Flying
As Rescuer Sphinx enters the battlefield, you may return a nonland permanent you control to its owner's hand. If you do, Rescuer Sphinx enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.

Return to Nature.flavor:
"Yes, nature is stronger. You don't see little buildings sprouting on trees."
—Emmara
Return to Nature.name: Return to Nature
Return to Nature.text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target enchantment.
• Exile target card from a graveyard.

Rising Populace.flavor: Grief is a crucible where resolve is tempered.
Rising Populace.name: Rising Populace
Rising Populace.text: Whenever another creature or planeswalker you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Rising Populace.

Roalesk, Apex Hybrid.name: Roalesk, Apex Hybrid
Roalesk, Apex Hybrid.text:
Flying, trample
When Roalesk, Apex Hybrid enters the battlefield, put two +1/+1 counters on another target creature you control.
When Roalesk dies, proliferate, then proliferate again. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there. Then do it again.)

Role Reversal.flavor: Uthlon the Wise scandalized sphinx society, hooting the answers to riddles as he rampaged through Tin Street. Grangle, on the other hand, sat for hours, deep in thought, largely ignored by fellow goblins.
Role Reversal.name: Role Reversal
Role Reversal.text: Exchange control of two target permanents that share a permanent type.

Rubblebelt Rioters.flavor:
"If the system is broken, break the system."
—Domri Rade
Rubblebelt Rioters.name: Rubblebelt Rioters
Rubblebelt Rioters.text:
Haste
Whenever Rubblebelt Rioters attacks, it gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.

Saheeli's Silverwing.flavor: "Track the source of those thopters," Saheeli told her creation. "And feel free to snack on as many as you want."
Saheeli's Silverwing.name: Saheeli's Silverwing
Saheeli's Silverwing.text:
Flying
When Saheeli's Silverwing enters the battlefield, look at the top card of target opponent's library.

Saheeli, Sublime Artificer.name: Saheeli, Sublime Artificer
Saheeli, Sublime Artificer.text:
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.
-2: Target artifact you control becomes a copy of another target artifact or creature you control until end of turn, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types.

Samut's Sprint.flavor: Samut's war was intensely personal. Every hour she faced enemies she once loved as friends and horrors she once revered as gods.
Samut's Sprint.name: Samut's Sprint
Samut's Sprint.text: Target creature gets +2/+1 and gains haste until end of turn. Scry 1.

Samut, Tyrant Smasher.name: Samut, Tyrant Smasher
Samut, Tyrant Smasher.text:
Creatures you control have haste.
-1: Target creature gets +2/+1 and gains haste until end of turn. Scry 1.

Sarkhan the Masterless.name: Sarkhan the Masterless
Sarkhan the Masterless.text:
Whenever a creature attacks you or a planeswalker you control, each Dragon you control deals 1 damage to that creature.
+1: Until end of turn, each planeswalker you control becomes a 4/4 red Dragon creature and gains flying.
-3: Create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying.

Sarkhan's Catharsis.flavor: "You once brought havoc to my home and ruined my mind. I'm here to return the favor, Bolas."
Sarkhan's Catharsis.name: Sarkhan's Catharsis
Sarkhan's Catharsis.text: Sarkhan's Catharsis deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.

Shriekdiver.flavor:
"It's faster than we are. Draw its attention while the Ledev take aim!"
—Shauntal, Boros legionnaire
Shriekdiver.name: Shriekdiver
Shriekdiver.text:
Flying
{1}: Shriekdiver gains haste until end of turn.

Silent Submersible.name: Silent Submersible
Silent Submersible.text:
Whenever Silent Submersible deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, draw a card.
Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

Simic Guildgate.flavor:
"Mystery is beauty. Within the unknown we plumb revelation."
—Vannifar
Simic Guildgate.name: Simic Guildgate
Simic Guildgate.text:
Simic Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.

Single Combat.flavor: Not even a threat to the entire Multiverse could persuade them to put aside their feud.
Single Combat.name: Single Combat
Single Combat.text: Each player chooses a creature or planeswalker they control, then sacrifices the rest. Players can't cast creature or planeswalker spells until the end of your next turn.

Sky Theater Strix.flavor: Courier owls joined the fray, attacking the Dreadhorde with a viciousness usually reserved for mail thieves.
Sky Theater Strix.name: Sky Theater Strix
Sky Theater Strix.text:
Flying
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Sky Theater Strix gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

Snarespinner.flavor:
"Let's lure the drakes to the webs over the Samok Stand. Keep the spiders content."
—Aurelia
Snarespinner.name: Snarespinner
Snarespinner.text:
Reach
Whenever Snarespinner blocks a creature with flying, Snarespinner gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

Solar Blaze.flavor:
"The primary weapon is nothing more than light. It shows them what they are, and they burn of their own accord."
—Aurelia
Solar Blaze.name: Solar Blaze
Solar Blaze.text: Each creature deals damage to itself equal to its power.

Sorin's Thirst.flavor:
"I see you're out of the wall."
—Nahiri
Sorin's Thirst.name: Sorin's Thirst
Sorin's Thirst.text: Sorin's Thirst deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.

Sorin, Vengeful Bloodlord.name: Sorin, Vengeful Bloodlord
Sorin, Vengeful Bloodlord.text:
As long as it's your turn, creatures and planeswalkers you control have lifelink.
+2: Sorin, Vengeful Bloodlord deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.
-X: Return target creature card with converted mana cost X from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature is a Vampire in addition to its other types.

Soul Diviner.flavor: As the Eternal's cold fingers tightened around his throat, Domri realized what kind of master he had rushed to serve.
Soul Diviner.name: Soul Diviner
Soul Diviner.text: {T}, Remove a counter from an artifact, creature, land, or planeswalker you control: Draw a card.

Spark Double.name: Spark Double
Spark Double.text: You may have Spark Double enter the battlefield as a copy of a creature or planeswalker you control, except it enters with an additional +1/+1 counter on it if it's a creature, it enters with an additional loyalty counter on it if it's a planeswalker, and it isn't legendary if that permanent is legendary.

Spark Harvest.flavor: With the harvest of Domri's spark, the Elderspell began to fuel Bolas's ascension to godhood.
Spark Harvest.name: Spark Harvest
Spark Harvest.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or pay {3}{B}.
Destroy target creature or planeswalker.

Spark Reaper.flavor:
"I know they're unstoppable fighters created to harvest souls—it's just they're so rude about it."
—Kaya
Spark Reaper.name: Spark Reaper
Spark Reaper.text: {3}, Sacrifice a creature or planeswalker: You gain 1 life and draw a card.

Spellgorger Weird.flavor: Freed from their respective labs, the two weirds formed a partnership, feeding on the arcane energies of war.
Spellgorger Weird.name: Spellgorger Weird
Spellgorger Weird.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Spellgorger Weird.

Spellkeeper Weird.flavor: They worked well as a team, but they knew it couldn't last forever.
Spellkeeper Weird.name: Spellkeeper Weird
Spellkeeper Weird.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Spellkeeper Weird: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

Steady Aim.flavor: The archer's heart broke seeing her compatriots die far below, but she held position until the enemy was in range.
Steady Aim.name: Steady Aim
Steady Aim.text: Untap target creature. It gets +1/+4 and gains reach until end of turn.

Stealth Mission.flavor:
"What they don't know will definitely hurt them."
—Lazav
Stealth Mission.name: Stealth Mission
Stealth Mission.text: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control. That creature can't be blocked this turn.

Storm the Citadel.flavor:
"If we die, we die. But we cannot let him win."
—Ajani Goldmane
Storm the Citadel.name: Storm the Citadel
Storm the Citadel.text: Until end of turn, creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, destroy target artifact or enchantment defending player controls."

Storrev, Devkarin Lich.flavor: In times of war, only death flourishes.
Storrev, Devkarin Lich.name: Storrev, Devkarin Lich
Storrev, Devkarin Lich.text:
Trample
Whenever Storrev, Devkarin Lich deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, return to your hand target creature or planeswalker card in your graveyard that wasn't put there this combat.

Sunblade Angel.flavor: At Feather's command, squadrons of battle angels swarmed out of the Parhelion II, unsheathing blades made of molten dawn.
Sunblade Angel.name: Sunblade Angel

Tamiyo's Epiphany.flavor: Tamiyo wished only to observe the war, but she soon realized neutrality was not an option.
Tamiyo's Epiphany.name: Tamiyo's Epiphany

Tamiyo, Collector of Tales.name: Tamiyo, Collector of Tales
Tamiyo, Collector of Tales.text:
Spells and abilities your opponents control can't cause you to discard cards or sacrifice permanents.
+1: Choose a nonland card name, then reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all cards with the chosen name from among them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
-3: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

Teferi's Time Twist.flavor: "The safest place for you is not now."
Teferi's Time Twist.name: Teferi's Time Twist
Teferi's Time Twist.text: Exile target permanent you control. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step. If it enters the battlefield as a creature, it enters with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.

Teferi, Time Raveler.name: Teferi, Time Raveler
Teferi, Time Raveler.text:
Each opponent can cast spells only any time they could cast a sorcery.
+1: Until your next turn, you may cast sorcery spells as though they had flash.
-3: Return up to one target artifact, creature, or enchantment to its owner's hand. Draw a card.

Tenth District Legionnaire.flavor:
"The Tenth is under heavy attack, but it's being handled. I sent Mileva."
—Tajic
Tenth District Legionnaire.name: Tenth District Legionnaire
Tenth District Legionnaire.text:
Haste
Whenever you cast a spell that targets Tenth District Legionnaire, put a +1/+1 counter on Tenth District Legionnaire, then scry 1.

Teyo's Lightshield.flavor: Teyo gifted shields to as many allies as possible, knowing he could not always be there to protect them himself.
Teyo's Lightshield.name: Teyo's Lightshield
Teyo's Lightshield.text: When Teyo's Lightshield enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

Teyo, the Shieldmage.name: Teyo, the Shieldmage
Teyo, the Shieldmage.text:
You have hexproof. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
-2: Create a 0/3 white Wall creature token with defender.

Tezzeret, Master of the Bridge.name: Tezzeret, Master of the Bridge
Tezzeret, Master of the Bridge.text:
Creature and planeswalker spells you cast have affinity for artifacts.
+2: Tezzeret, Master of the Bridge deals X damage to each opponent, where X is the number of artifacts you control. You gain X life.
-3: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
-8: Exile the top ten cards of your library. Put all artifact cards from among them onto the battlefield.

The Elderspell.flavor: The path to power is often paved with atrocities.
The Elderspell.name: The Elderspell
The Elderspell.text: Destroy any number of target planeswalkers. Choose a planeswalker you control. Put two loyalty counters on it for each planeswalker destroyed this way.

The Wanderer.name: The Wanderer
The Wanderer.text:
Prevent all noncombat damage that would be dealt to you and other permanents you control.
-2: Exile target creature with power 4 or greater.

Thunder Drake.flavor: The arrival of the Planar Bridge caused eddies in the aether, creating some entirely new species while transforming others.
Thunder Drake.name: Thunder Drake
Thunder Drake.text:
Flying
Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Thunder Drake.

Thundering Ceratok.flavor:
"I thought this was a civilized place. How are there so many feral beasts?"
—Dovin Baan
Thundering Ceratok.name: Thundering Ceratok
Thundering Ceratok.text:
Trample
When Thundering Ceratok enters the battlefield, other creatures you control gain trample until end of turn.

Tibalt's Rager.flavor:
"Find out whose that is. I like its energy."
—Judith
Tibalt's Rager.name: Tibalt's Rager
Tibalt's Rager.text:
When Tibalt's Rager dies, it deals 1 damage to any target.
{1}{R}: Tibalt's Rager gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

Tibalt, Rakish Instigator.name: Tibalt, Rakish Instigator
Tibalt, Rakish Instigator.text:
Your opponents can't gain life.
-2: Create a 1/1 red Devil creature token with "Whenever this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target."

Time Wipe.flavor:
"To comprehend the full answer requires years of temporal study. In short, they were now never born in the first place."
—Teferi
Time Wipe.name: Time Wipe
Time Wipe.text: Return a creature you control to its owner's hand, then destroy all creatures.

Tithebearer Giant.flavor:
"I've always said full war chests win wars, but I didn't mean by bashing enemy skulls with them."
—Teysa
Tithebearer Giant.name: Tithebearer Giant
Tithebearer Giant.text: When Tithebearer Giant enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

Toll of the Invasion.name: Toll of the Invasion
Toll of the Invasion.text:
Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
Amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

Tolsimir, Friend to Wolves.name: Tolsimir, Friend to Wolves
Tolsimir, Friend to Wolves.text:
When Tolsimir, Friend to Wolves enters the battlefield, create Voja, Friend to Elves, a legendary 3/3 green and white Wolf creature token.
Whenever a Wolf enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 3 life and that creature fights up to one target creature an opponent controls.

Tomik, Distinguished Advokist.flavor: "Some bend the law. I tie it into knots.
Tomik, Distinguished Advokist.name: Tomik, Distinguished Advokist
Tomik, Distinguished Advokist.text:
Flying
Lands on the battlefield and land cards in graveyards can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.
Your opponents can't play land cards from graveyards.

Topple the Statue.flavor: Bolas cared little when his statue fell, thinking it a useful distraction, underestimating the surge of resolve it gave his opponents.
Topple the Statue.name: Topple the Statue
Topple the Statue.text:
Tap target permanent. If it's an artifact, destroy it.
Draw a card.

Totally Lost.flavor: At least this was better than that week at the Juri Revue.
Totally Lost.name: Totally Lost
Totally Lost.text: Put target nonland permanent on top of its owner's library.

Trusted Pegasus.flavor: "Would you give your life to save the world?" Gideon murmured. The pegasus snorted and spread wide its mighty wings.
Trusted Pegasus.name: Trusted Pegasus
Trusted Pegasus.text:
Flying
Whenever Trusted Pegasus attacks, target attacking creature without flying gains flying until end of turn.

Turret Ogre.flavor: Common Gruul career aspirations: berserker, shaman, catapault.
Turret Ogre.name: Turret Ogre
Turret Ogre.text:
Reach
When Turret Ogre enters the battlefield, if you control another creature with power 4 or greater, Turret Ogre deals 2 damage to each opponent.

Tyrant's Scorn.flavor:
"The hero with the magic sword slays the dragon? Not this time."
—Nicol Bolas
Tyrant's Scorn.name: Tyrant's Scorn
Tyrant's Scorn.text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target creature with converted mana cost 3 or less.
• Return target creature to its owner's hand.

Ugin's Conjurant.name: Ugin's Conjurant
Ugin's Conjurant.text:
Ugin's Conjurant enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
If damage would be dealt to Ugin's Conjurant while it has a +1/+1 counter on it, prevent that damage and remove that many +1/+1 counters from Ugin's Conjurant.

Ugin, the Ineffable.name: Ugin, the Ineffable
Ugin, the Ineffable.text:
Colorless spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.
+1: Exile the top card of your library face down and look at it. Create a 2/2 colorless Spirit creature token. When that token leaves the battlefield, put the exiled card into your hand.
-3: Destroy target permanent that's one or more colors.

Unlikely Aid.flavor:
"No one will ever ride me again, Gideon. Expect no further favors."
—Rakdos
Unlikely Aid.name: Unlikely Aid
Unlikely Aid.text: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

Vampire Opportunist.name: Vampire Opportunist
Vampire Opportunist.text: {6}{B}: Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

Vivien's Arkbow.name: Vivien's Arkbow
Vivien's Arkbow.text: {X}, {T}, Discard a card: Look at the top X cards of your library. You may put a creature card with converted mana cost X or less from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

Vivien's Grizzly.name: Vivien's Grizzly
Vivien's Grizzly.text: {3}{G}: Look at the top card of your library. If it's a creature or planeswalker card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand. If you don't put the card into your hand, put it on the bottom of your library.

Vivien, Champion of the Wilds.name: Vivien, Champion of the Wilds
Vivien, Champion of the Wilds.text:
You may cast creature spells as though they had flash.
+1: Until your next turn, up to one target creature gains vigilance and reach.
-2: Look at the top three cards of your library. Exile one face down and put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. For as long as it remains exiled, you may look at that card and you may cast it if it's a creature card.

Vizier of the Scorpion.name: Vizier of the Scorpion
Vizier of the Scorpion.text:
When Vizier of the Scorpion enters the battlefield, amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
Zombie tokens you control have deathtouch.

Vraska's Finisher.flavor: "You might have pleaded your case with my queen earlier. Now I am here, and it is far too late."
Vraska's Finisher.name: Vraska's Finisher
Vraska's Finisher.text: When Vraska's Finisher enters the battlefield, destroy target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls that was dealt damage this turn.

Vraska, Swarm's Eminence.name: Vraska, Swarm's Eminence
Vraska, Swarm's Eminence.text:
Whenever a creature you control with deathtouch deals damage to a player or planeswalker, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.
-2: Create a 1/1 black Assassin creature token with deathtouch and "Whenever this creature deals damage to a planeswalker, destroy that planeswalker."

Wall of Runes.flavor:
"It's strangely satisfying seeing an undead killing machine from another world standing befuddled in front of a wall of text."
—Lavinia
Wall of Runes.name: Wall of Runes
Wall of Runes.text:
Defender
When Wall of Runes enters the battlefield, scry 1.

Wanderer's Strike.flavor:
"Precise, clean cuts. No one saw anything. Again. Tag the report with my code and file it."
—Lavinia
Wanderer's Strike.name: Wanderer's Strike
Wanderer's Strike.text: Exile target creature, then proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

War Screecher.flavor: Soaring over Vitu-Ghazi, New Prahv, and Orzhova, the Conclave's trained falcons provided critical intelligence.
War Screecher.name: War Screecher
War Screecher.text:
Flying
{5}{W}, {T}: Other creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

Wardscale Crocodile.flavor:
"The Eternals had to endure Amonkhet's five trails. Let's see if they can pass the Trial of Ravnica."
—Jace Beleren
Wardscale Crocodile.name: Wardscale Crocodile
Wardscale Crocodile.text: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

Widespread Brutality.name: Widespread Brutality
Widespread Brutality.text: Amass 2, then the Army you amassed deals damage equal to its power to each non-Army creature. (To amass 2, put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
